author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Welcome to the Depths of Perdition, where the sci-fi bunker is fully stocked with scatter terrain… and is somehow giving The Office.

We’ve recreated the Annex, the Warehouse/Break Room, and the Conference Room—basically every place you’d hide during a mandatory team-building exercise or desperately flee from during a totally legitimate fire drill.

Matthew, Dave, Josh, Skari, and Luka make cameo appearances in miniature form, posing atop crates, bunks, and other modular pieces while fighting Mini Wargs aiming at them.

And yes, this whole short is set to The Office theme—because even in a grim sci-fi bunker, the real threat is still an unexpected meeting invite.

Find out more about this amazing scatter terrain at MiniWarGaming.com/perdition
title: Just Another Day at...The Office?

author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Back the Kickstarter here:  https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/miniwargaming/depths-of-perdition-modular-3d-printed-scifi-interiors?ref=1ruvtc

*Explore The Depths of Perdition — a fully modular sci-fi interior terrain system built from 6" magnetic tiles that lock together for fast setup, rock-solid stability, and cinematic gameplay.* Whether you play Kill Team, Necromunda, 40K Boarding Actions, Stargrave, or any sci-fi skirmish game, this system lets you build starships, bunkers, labs, and industrial complexes that actually *feel* like real places.

Available as *STL files* you can 3D print at home (optimized for small FDM printers), or as *physical terrain sets* shipped to you ready to paint and play. Create endless layouts, use functional doors and detailed scatter, and enjoy terrain that won’t shift, wobble, or fall apart mid-game.

👉 *Back the Kickstarter now:* *https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/miniwargaming/depths-of-perdition-modular-3d-printed-scifi-interiors?ref=1ruvtc*
title: How To Make Your Sci-Fi Table Look Awesome
